info.description: Authentication, Authorization, and Accounting Service with SpiceDB integration
info.title: AAA Service API

post.description: Create a new address for a user

get.description: Search for addresses based on query parameters
Retrieve an address by its unique identifier

delete.description: Delete an address by its unique identifier

get.description: Retrieve audit logs with optional filtering
Get detailed health status of all system components
Get current maintenance mode status and configuration

post.description: Enable or disable system maintenance mode

get.description: Get comprehensive system and application metrics
Get comprehensive system information including service details, runtime info, and configuration

post.description: Authenticate user with username and password and MFA
Refresh access token using refresh token
Register a new user account with enhanced validation
Set or update mPin for secure refresh token validation

get.description: Basic health check for the AAA service
Get a list of all registered modules

post.description: Register a complete module with actions, roles, resources, and permissions

get.description: Get detailed information about a registered module
Check if a module is healthy and operational
Get a paginated list of permissions

post.description: Create a new permission with resource, effect, and actions
Check if a user has permission to perform an action on a resource
Grant temporary permission to a user for specific actions on a resource

get.description: Retrieve a permission by its unique identifier

delete.description: Delete a permission by its unique identifier

get.description: Get a paginated list of roles

post.description: Create a new role with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a role by its unique identifier

delete.description: Delete a role by its unique identifier

get.description: Get a list of all users with pagination

post.description: Create a new user with the provided information

get.description: Search for users based on query parameters
Get detailed information about a specific user

delete.description: Delete a user by their unique identifier

post.description: Assign a role to a specific user

delete.description: Remove a role from a specific user

get.description: Get basic service health status
Check if service is alive
Check if service is ready to accept requests

requests.ModuleActionDefinition.description: Action definition structure for module registration

requests.ModuleRegistrationRequest.description: Request structure for registering a new module

requests.ModuleResourceDefinition.description: Resource definition structure for module registration

requests.ModuleRoleDefinition.description: Role definition structure for module registration

requests.UpdateUserRequest.description: Request structure for updating user information

responses.LoginResponseData.description: Login response data containing tokens and user info

responses.LoginSuccessResponse.description: Successful login response with tokens and user info

responses.RegisterResponseData.description: Registration response data containing user info

responses.RegisterSuccessResponse.description: Successful registration response with user info

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
